page.title: 14FIRE SERVICES - BIGGIN HILL
page.content:
BIGGIN HILL FIRE STATION
There are four shifts at the fire station: Red, White, Blue and Green. Local government runs the fire station which is open 24 hours a day. The fire engine can carry 300 gallons of water. Biggin Hill Fire Station has only got one fire engine and one fire car. The fire engine can hold 6 people but it is only allowed 5. Each fire engine has a number on it, Biggin Hill's is H 25. The Biggin Hill fire engine registration number is NYV 707Y. They have a zip gun that can be put on to a hose and used as a gun. they have cutting equipment at the back of thr engine and tools at the side and three oxygen cyliners. The ladders reach 13.5 metres in length.
